events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred last night involving my vehicle and another car at the intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision provided.
An agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim and will be reaching out to you shortly.
We acknowledge receipt of your car accident claim and have begun initial processing steps.
Please provide pictures of the vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with your claim.
I have submitted all requested documents, including photos of the damage and the official police report.
Our claims investigator has started examining the submitted evidence and verifying details of the vehicle collision.
The investigation into the auto accident has been completed and the findings are under review for settlement.
We propose a settlement offer to cover the repair costs and damages incurred from your vehicle collision.
The customer has reviewed and accepted the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the resolution process.
Your auto accident claim has been officially approved based on the investigation and agreed settlement terms.
The settlement payment for your car damage has been processed and issued to your bank account.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed. Thank you for cooperating throughout the claim process.
